title: DevOps Must Optimize Tech Stacks and Streamline Strategy for 2025
author: Krishna Yadappanavar
description: DevOps should implement these tools and best practices to foster productivity, improve the developer experience, and drive innovation in 2025.
cntitle: DevOps 必须优化技术栈并简化 2025 年的战略
cndescription: DevOps 应实施这些工具和最佳实践，以促进 2025 年的生产力、改善开发者体验并推动创新。
